name: Piggle Rush
description:
Summary:

Discover Piggle Rush a cute arcade puzzle game full of adorable characters and...pigs! Put your crown on, quest through the colorful lands, stop the Piggle Kingdom before they eat all the food supplies.

This is a PC-Port of a soon to release Mobile Game -  Piggle Rush!

Created in Unreal Engine 4

Features:

  1. 60 levels
  2. Multiple Powers and Environments
  3. Customization and Rewards
  4. Save system to come back and play whenever!

Instructions:

Click and Drag to move on the map screen:

Click and Hold to Aim / Release to fire cannonballs:

And that's it! Defend your land from all different types of invading Piggles!
